name: Getlinks Co Ltd.
description: Operator of an online recruitment platform intended to connect tech talents with opportunities across Asia. The company's platform helps job seekers to build a digital resume that highlights strengths and achievements to impress potential employers, follow job openings and apply and chat with recruiters, enabling students to find a suitable job and connect with the professional world.
one_liner: Operator of an online recruitment platform intended to connect tech talents with opportunities across Asia. The company's platform helps job seekers to build a digital resume that highlights strengths and achievements to impress potential employers, follow job openings and apply and chat with recruiters, enabling students to find a suitable job and connect with the professional world.
